alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 1:54PM CST until January 27 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork San Jacinto near Porter affecting Montgomery County. For the West Fork San Jacinto River...including Porter, Sendera Ranch Road, Conroe, Humble, Sheldon...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork San Jacinto near Porter. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 83.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding continues as the turnaround under SH99 at Riley Fuzzel Road begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 76.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 73.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 83.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 81.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun West Fork San Jacinto Porter 81.0 76.3 Thu 12 pm CS 82.4 79.4 77.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.Friday morning at 800 AM CST.
